name: Vinnie Colaiuta
description: '''Vincent Peter Colaiuta''' (born February 5, 1956) is an American drummer known for his technical mastery who has worked as a [[session musician]] in many genres. He was inducted into the ''[[Modern Drummer]]'' Hall of Fame in 1996 and the ''Classic Drummer'' Hall of Fame in 2014. Colaiuta has won one Grammy Award and has been nominated twice. Since the late 1970s, he has recorded and toured with [[Frank Zappa]], [[Joni Mitchell]], and [[Sting (musician)|Sting]], among many other appearances in the studio and in concert.
